content.question: The passage provides evidence for which of the following features of Russian society?

choices.label: The development of distinct new class identities based on labor
The continued dominance of landowning elites
New conservative ideologies based on a return to traditional authority
Socialist-inspired ideologies based on government planning for society

content.answer: The continued dominance of landowning elites

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
